com.ers.internship.jdbc

Class AbstractCrudDao<IdType,E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ers.internship.jdbc.AbstractCrudDao<IdType,E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.ers.internship.dao.CrudDao<IdType,E>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FxQuoteDaoImpl, InstrumentDaoImpl, InstrumentPriceQuoteDaoImpl, PortfolioDaoImpl, PositionDaoImpl, TransactionDaoImpl, YieldCurveDaoImpl

    public abstract class AbstractCrudDao<IdType,E>
extends Object
implements com.ers.internship.dao.CrudDao<IdType,E>
    Author:
    Snejina Yanakieva The database is historized and every entity has two tables in it.The first table IDB_"ENTITY" refers to the component entity's ID. The second table IDB_"ENTITY"_STATE is used to store all states of the entity.

      • save

        protected void save(IdType entityId,
                    String tableName,
                    String stateTableName,
                    String[] columnNames,
                    E entity,
                    String[] idTableColumnNames)
        Creates or updates an entity in the database. If the item does not exist in the database it is created, else it is updated.
        Parameters:
        entityId - The component entity's ID
        tableName - The table is IDB_"ENTITY"
        stateTableName - The table is IDB_"ENTITY"_STATE
        columnNames - The entity's properties are columns in table IDB_"ENTITY"_STATE
        entity - The current entity
        idTableColumnNames - The components of entity's ID are columns in table IDB_"ENTITY"
